title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 55.7 - Use of facsimile signature
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 55.7 - Use of facsimile signature

State Regulations

Any officer required by this Part to subscribe his name
upon an obligation which is to be cancelled or destroyed may use, in lieu of an
actual signature, a stamp or other device which will produce in ink a facsimile
signature of such officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
55.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
